title: Chloe Valdary 2: Chloe and Jordan Peterson Share the same Sense of Wonder and Belief in the Good
description: Chloe and I share a longer conversation here which includes her life story and her responses to a series of Jordan Peterson quotes: https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytwQ
